info.title: Bybit API
info.description:
## REST API for the Bybit Exchange.
Base URI: [https://api.bybit.com]

get.summary: Get Bybit OpenAPI announcements in the last 30 days in reverse order.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: From ID. Default: return latest data

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit for data size, max size is 1000. Default size is 500

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start timestamp point for result, in millisecond

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End timestamp point for result, in millisecond

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit for data size, max size is 1000. Default size is 500

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit for data size, max size is 200. Default size is 50

parameters.description: Limit for data size, max size is 1000. Default size is 500

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit for data size, max size is 500. Default size is 50

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: A symbol which you want change its leverage

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Contract type which you want update its margin

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Contract type which you want update its margin

parameters.name: take_profit
parameters.description: Not less than 0, 0 means cancel TP

parameters.name: stop_loss
parameters.description: Not less than 0, 0 means cancel SL

parameters.name: trailing_stop
parameters.description: Not less than 0, 0 means cancel TS

parameters.name: new_trailing_active
parameters.description: Trailing stop trigger price. Trailing stops are triggered only when the price reaches the specified price. Trailing stops are triggered immediately by default.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit for data size per page, max size is 50. Default as showing 20 pieces of data per page

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start ID. By default, returns the latest IDs

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Search direction. Prev: searches in ascending order from start ID, Next: searches in descending order from start ID. Defaults to Next

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page. Default getting first page data

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit for data size per page, max size is 50. Default as showing 20 pieces of data per page

parameters.name: risk_id
parameters.description: Risk ID. Can be found with the Get risk limit list endpoint.

parameters.name: order_link_id
parameters.description: TCustomized order ID, maximum length at 36 characters, and order ID under the same agency has to be unique.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: TLimit for data size per page, max size is 50. Default as showing 20 pieces of data per page

parameters.name: order_status
parameters.description: Query your orders for all statuses if 'order_status' is empty. If you want to query orders with specific statuses , you can pass the order_status split by

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Search direction. prev: prev page, next: next page. Defaults to next

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Page turning mark，Use return cursor,Sign use origin data, in request please urlencode

post.summary: Replace active order. Only incomplete orders can be modified.

parameters.name: base_price
parameters.description: Send current market price. It will be used to compare with the value of 'stop_px', to decide whether your conditional order will be triggered by crossing trigger price from upper side or lower side. Mainly used to identify the expected direction of the current conditional order..

parameters.name: order_link_id
parameters.description: Customized order ID, maximum length at 36 characters, and order ID under the same agency has to be unique..

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit for data size per page, max size is 50. Default as showing 20 pieces of data per page.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Search direction. prev: prev page, next: next page. Defaults to next

post.summary: Replace conditional order. Only incomplete orders can be modified.

get.summary: Get predicted funding rate and funding fee.

Funding settlement occurs every 8 hours at 00:00 UTC, 08:00 UTC and 16:00 UTC. The current interval's fund fee settlement is based on the previous interval's fund rate. For example, at 16:00, the settlement is based on the fund rate generated at 8:00. The fund rate generated at 16:00 will be used at 0:00 on the next day.
Get predicted funding rate and funding fee.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: OrderID. If not provided, will return user’s trading records.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Contract type. If order_id not provided, symbol is required.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page. Default getting first page data.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit for data size per page, max size is 50. Default as showing 20 pieces of data per page.

get.summary: Get user's closed profit and loss records

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start timestamp point for result, in second

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End timestamp point for result, in second

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page. By default, gets first page of data. Maximum of 50 pages

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit for data size per page, max size is 50. Default as showing 20 pieces of data per page.
